description: This is a React/Next.js layout component defining the main structure of the front-end application, including metadata, global styles, a token management bridge, and layout components such as Navbar and Footer.

methods.name: TokenBridge
methods.description: A React function component that initializes authentication token management by accessing global window store or dynamically importing auth store.

methods.name: RootLayout
methods.description: The main layout component that renders the HTML structure, including metadata, navigation, footer, and children content.
